content:
Please do not contribute to the 3-sum now; Ivan has come up with a different but definitionally equal definition and we will probably change all 3-sum to what is in the last section here:
https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour/compare/main...sum3-refactor
It is safe to work on the 3-sum again. Anybody can contribute.

What do you think about the newly suggested refactor?
https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour/compare/main...sum3-refactor
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
